items.sentence: Everyone knew that Tom didn\'t want to go to Australia.
Tom did the best he could, but he still got bad grades.
Raising taxes may not be such a good idea at this time.
Thanks to everyone who's helped me these past few days.
Tom pretended he didn't notice Mary was staring at him.
Tom will probably not be able to resist the temptation.
The ice on the pond isn't thick enough yet for skating.
Could you please speak more quietly? I have a hangover.
Tom couldn't afford to buy the computer that he wanted.
There are a lot of people that I need to talk to today.
